name: Bear Adventure
description:
Do you miss mind-blowingly difficult games? Then Bear Adventure will be a real find for you. In this incredibly challenging game, you have to play as a funny bear who has to get through all the obstacles and eat all his food!

If you really like challenging platform games, then this game definitely deserves your attention! As a bear, you will need to eat all the food in the level. This will take you to the next level. Eating all the food in the level will not be an easy task at all!!! Only professional players can handle it! Challenge yourself and try to complete all levels of this challenging and interesting game.

Game Features:
Interesting gameplay and cool atmosphere!
Intuitive interface!
Incredibly cool level design!
Funny music!
Stylish graphics!
